info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 10:48PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Greene and north central Craighead Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1048 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hoxie, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Bono, Brookland, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Fontaine, Walcott, Stanford, Light, Walnut Corner, Lanieve, Finch, Lorado, Herndon, Faulknerville and Crowley`s Ridge State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
